SEARCH
Module com.example.myuno
Package com.example.myuno.model.player

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.example.myuno.model.player.AbstractPlayer
com.example.myuno.model.player.HumanPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player, Serializable
public class HumanPlayer extends AbstractPlayer
Represents a human player in the UNO game.

This class extends AbstractPlayer and provides interaction methods for selecting and playing cards based on user input.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • playCard

      public Card playCard(GameContext context)
      Attempts to play the card previously selected by the user.

      If a card has been selected, it is removed from the deck and returned. Otherwise, returns null.

      Specified by:
      playCard in interface Player
      Specified by:
      playCard in class AbstractPlayer
      Parameters:
      context - the current game context
      Returns:
      the card played, or null if no card was selected
